83582.affected_area: Chilliwack (Chilliwack Mountain & Chilliwack Proper Village West)
83582.summary: Some customers in the Chilliwack Mountain, Chilliwack Proper Village West, & Chilliwack Proper Village West areas of Chilliwack are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83582.title: Oct 4 - Chilliwack (Chilliwack Mountain & Chilliwack Proper Village West) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
